name: Blind Spot (itch)
description:
Blind Spot is a 4 player versus stealth game based on painting tiles and changing your character's colour to hide and ambush your friends! The last survivor is the winner!

Features

  • 4-player colourful multiplayer madness!
  • Seemingly easy gameplay with layers of complexity
  • Controller support
  • Express your soul through the use of colours (wait...what?)

Team

Driko Gonçalves | Code, Gameplay Programmer, GD

Jg Guimarães| Art, Animation, GD

Controls

ABXY - Change the character's colour according to the xbox controller's button colour.

Stick -  Move

Right Trigger - Shoot colour blobs
